unnormalised: Boro, tumi integral calculus-ant buddtat, hanv? Chintna korum naka, tem dista titlem bhirantichem na! Differentiation-achem ulto mhunn chint, eka curve-achea khala axil'lem kshetra soddun kaddolem mhunn. Tumkam xallent sumaropache dis ugddaita? Ami tem mullant anantak gheunk zata!
normalised: Boro, tumi integral calculus-ant budh marthaat, hã? Chinta korunk naka, tem dista titlem bhayanak nhoi! Tem differentiation-achem ul’tem, ek curve khalichi jagh kaddta titlem chintat. Tumchea skulantleo summation-acheo disani ugddas asa? Ami tem basically infinity-k vorta!

unnormalised: Tumi dhara ki tumchea kodden ek function asa, f(x). Tem integrate korop mhunnttlear dusrem function soddun kaddop, taka F(x) mhunn-di, jem F(x) chem derivative f(x) haka soman asta. Notation-ache nodren, tem ∫f(x) dx = F(x) + C mhunn boroitat. Tem 'C' mahatvachem, BTW. Tem integration chem constant. Tem kednach visrum naka!
normalised: Dhorun ghea tumchea kodden ek function asa, f of x. Integration korop mhanllear dusrem function sodun kaddop, F of x mhonnun apounk dium, oxem ki F of x chem derivative f of x-ak soman asta. Notation-ache dristtin, tem integral of f of x d x equals F of x plus C mhonnun boroitat. Tem ‘C’ mhatvachem, B-T-W. Tem integration-achem constant. Tem kednach visrunk naka!

unnormalised: Atam, kaim integrals khub sope asat. x^n chem integral (zoim n -1 nhoi) tem (x^(n+1))/(n+1) + C. Mhunnge x^2 chem integral (x^3)/3 + C. Sope, boro? Punn ∫1/x dx kitem? Thoinch natural logarithm yetai! Tem ln|x| + C.
normalised: Atam, khup integrals sidhe astat. x chi takot n (zaithem n negative ek nhoi) hacho integral (x chi takot (n plus ek)) bhagile (n plus ek) plus C. Mhonnge, x squared hacho integral (x cubed) bhagile tin plus C. Sompem assa, nhõi? Punn ek bhagile x d x hacho integral kitem? Thõi natural logarithm bhitor yeta! Tem x chem absolute value plus C chem natural logarithm.

unnormalised: Integrals che don mukhel prokar asat: definite ani indefinite. Indefinite integrals tumkam ek function dita, F(x) + C, jache vixim ami uloitanv. Definite integrals, dusre vatten, tumkam ek ankddo ditat. Tumi don limits, 'a' ani 'b' hache modhe integrate kortat, jem ∫ab f(x) dx mhunn.
normalised: Integrals che don mukhel prakar astat: definite ani indefinite. Indefinite integrals tumkam ek function ditat, F of x plus C, jem ami uloup kortale. Definite integrals, dusre vatten, tumkam ek number ditat. Tumi don limits, ‘a’ ani ‘b’ modem integrate kortat, jemintegral from a to b of f of x d x.

unnormalised: Ek definite integral calculate korpak, tumi poilim indefinite integral, F(x) soddun kadtat. Uprant, tumi F(b) ani F(a) evaluate kortat ani tankam subtract kortat: F(b) - F(a). Ugddas dovrat ki definite integrals ant 'C' pois zata, mhunnche thoinch chintna korchi goroz na! Let’s say ∫01 x dx, tem [(1^2)/2 + C] - [(0^2)/2 + C] = ½ zatolem.
normalised: Ek definite integral calculate korunk, tumi poilem indefinite integral sodun kaddat, F of x. Uprant, tumi F of b ani F of a evaluate kortat ani tankam subtract kortat: F of b minus F of a. Ugddas dovrat ki ‘C’ definite integrals ant nasta, mhonnun thõi duhkunk zai na! Let’s say integral from zero to one of x d x, tem [(ek squared) bhagile don plus C] minus [(zero squared) bhagile don plus C] equals ek ardo zatlem.

unnormalised: Punn rav, tem adhun tricky zata! Ami integration by parts sarkhea techniques vixim uloiunk zai. Hem tumchea kodden don functions chem product astana vaportat, jem ∫x*sin(x) dx sarkhem. Formula mhunnlear ∫u dv = uv - ∫v du. Trick mhunnlear koxak 'u' mhunn ani koxak 'dv' mhunn ulo korcho.
normalised: Punn ravat, tem avghod zata! Ami integration by parts sarkhea techniques vixim uloiunk zai. Hacho vapor tumchea kodden don functions chem product astana kortat, integral of x times sine of x d x sarkhem. Formula integral of u d v equals u v minus integral of v d u. Technique kitem function ‘u’ mhonnun apounk ani kitem ‘dv’ mhonnun apounk.

unnormalised: Ani ek handy technique mhunnlear integration by substitution (u-substitution mhunnunui vollokhtat). Tuje kodden integral bhitor composite function aslear, ∫2x*cos(x^2) dx sarkhem, tumi u = x^2 mhunn let korunk xakta. Magir, du = 2x dx. Hea values integral ant substitute kor, ani tem ∫cos(u) du zata, jem solve korpak sope asta!
normalised: Ani ek sopachem technique integration by substitution (u-substitution mhonnunui zannam asa). Tumchea kodden integral bhitor ek composite function astana, integral of two x times cosine of x squared d x sarkhem, tumi u equals x squared mhonnun gheunk zatat. Uprant, d u equals two x d x. He values integral bhitor substitute korat, ani tem integral of cosine of u d u zata, jem sodounk khup sopem!

unnormalised: Tricky functions vixim kitem? Partial fractions sarkhile vostu rational functions (numerator ani denominator ant polynomials aslolea fractions) sopim forms ant todpak tumkam modot kortat, jinka integrate korpak sope zata. Udharonnak, (1/(x^2-1)) hem 1/2 * [1/(x-1) - 1/(x+1)] mhunn boroitat. Mhunnun integral relative sopem zata.
normalised: Avghod functions vixim kitem? Partial fractions sarkheo vostu tumkam rational functions (numerator ani denominator ant polynomials aslele fractions) sopem korunk help kortat jem integrate korunk sopem. Udharonnak, (ek bhagile (x squared minus one)) ek ardo times [ek bhagile (x minus one) minus ek bhagile (x plus one)] mhonnun boroitat. Mhonnun integral relatively sopem zata.

unnormalised: Ek sadharan proshn mhunnlear, "Hanv dor ek technique kedna vaporta?". Imanandaren, hem soglle practice vixim asta! Functions chem products (integration by parts), composite functions (substitution), ani rational functions (partial fractions) sodat. Kiteak mhunnlear tumi jeo title integrals solve kortat, teo tumi kiteak tech technique vaprunk favo vollokhpak tumkam borem zatolem. Ek novim dishi xikta mhunn chint - khub *tadka* ghevn, of course!
normalised: Ek sadharonn prosn mhanllear, "Hanv kedna eka technique vaporunk?" Satyan sangunk gelear, tem soglle practice vixim asa! Functions chem products (integration by parts), composite functions (substitution), ani rational functions (partial fractions) sodhat. Titlem tumi integrals sodoutat, titlem tumkam technique vaprunk sodunk bore zata. Tem novem jeunn randunk shikongelem chintat - khup tadka asun, mhonnge!

unnormalised: Mhunnun, hem integral calculus chem ek vegaan pasarant vollokh. Ugddas dovrat, hem soglle concepts somzopani ani practice, practice, practice korpache vixim asta! Sopia integrals pasun survat kor ani dhire dhire adhun challenge-i integrals pasun kam kor. Ani integration chem constant visrum naka, C! Happy integrating, bhai!
normalised: Mhonnun, integral calculus-achem tem ek vegin zannvai. Ugddas dovrat, tem soglle concepts samzon gheunk ani practice korunk, practice korunk, practice korunk! Sompem integrals thaun suru korat ani thode thode korun challenge-achem vatten bhitor sortat. Ani tem integration-achem constant, C visrunk naka! Happy integrating, bhai!
